name: Erase Car Free
description:
Erase Car is a fun new game where you drive your car and erase doodles.
Perfect! ★★★★★ – "Absolutely perfect use of the iPod touch's capabilities! Smooth, reactive gameplay..."
-- User review

75 doodles to erase in three different modes keeps you trying to beat your best time over and over again.

➜ 75 erase tracks
➜ 3 cars for 3 levels of difficulty
➜ Game Center Support
➜ Independent high scores for each level of difficulty
